channel.title: SUI - Blog
channel.description: Follow the SUI blog to learn about new product features, latest advancements in UI development, and business initiatives.

item.title: Introducing Pigment CSS: the next generation of CSS-in-JS
item.description: Pigment CSS offers significant performance gains along with RSC and App Router support.

item.title: Material UI Sync: a Figma plugin that exports theme code
item.description: Enable designers to generate production-ready code directly from the Material UI Figma Design Kit.

item.title: Bringing consistency to Material UI customization APIs
item.description: We're standardizing two key areas of the Material UI customization APIs to reduce complexity and cognitive overhead. Read on to learn what's changing.

item.description: The unstyled component library will get a stable release, lots of new components, and even better DX in 2024.

item.title: The Tree View is moving to MUI X
item.description: Migrate to the new package to start building with our powerful Tree View, now part of MUI X. Previously released MIT components will stay MIT.

item.title: MUI Core libraries support the Next.js App Router
item.description: Material UI, Base UI, and Joy UI are now compatible with the App Router as Client Components. Get started using the latest Next.js features with MUI!
